title: అర్జున విషాద యోగం - Arjuna Vishada Yoga
objective: Understand Arjuna's dilemma and emotional state before the war begins (Telugu).
prompt: Reflect on a time when you faced a difficult decision. How did you feel? What was your internal conflict?

title: సాంఖ్య యోగం - Sankhya Yoga
objective: Learn about the eternal nature of the soul and its relationship with the body (Telugu).
prompt: What do you think makes you 'you'? Is it your body, your thoughts, or something deeper?

title: కర్మ యోగం - Karma Yoga
objective: Understand the path of selfless action and its benefits (Telugu).
prompt: Think of a time when you helped someone without expecting anything in return. How did it feel?

title: జ్ఞాన కర్మ సన్యాస యోగం - Jnana Karma Sanyasa Yoga
objective: Explore the path of spiritual knowledge and wisdom (Telugu).
prompt: What is the difference between knowing something intellectually and truly understanding it?

title: కర్మ సన్యాస యోగం - Karma Sanyasa Yoga
objective: Learn about the path of devotion and love for the divine (Telugu).
prompt: What does devotion mean to you? How do you express love and gratitude?

title: ఆత్మ సంయమ యోగం - Atma Samyama Yoga
objective: Understand the three qualities of nature: Sattva, Rajas, and Tamas (Telugu).
prompt: Which quality do you see most in yourself: calmness (Sattva), activity (Rajas), or inertia (Tamas)?

title: జ్ఞాన విజ్ఞాన యోగం - Jnana Vijnana Yoga
objective: Learn to remain balanced in success and failure (Telugu).
prompt: How do you handle success and failure? Do they affect your inner peace?

title: అక్షర బ్రహ్మ యోగం - Akshara Brahma Yoga
objective: Explore the various forms and manifestations of the divine (Telugu).
prompt: Where do you see beauty and divinity in your daily life?

title: రాజ విద్యా యోగం - Raja Vidya Yoga
objective: Understand Krishna's revelation of his cosmic form to Arjuna (Telugu).
prompt: How do you perceive the vastness and interconnectedness of the universe?

title: విభూతి యోగం - Vibhuti Yoga
objective: Learn about complete surrender to the divine will (Telugu).
prompt: What does surrender mean to you? Is it giving up or finding strength?

title: విశ్వరూప దర్శన యోగం - Vishwarupa Darshana Yoga
objective: Understand the distinction between the eternal and temporary (Telugu).
prompt: What do you consider permanent in your life? What is temporary?

title: భక్తి యోగం - Bhakti Yoga
objective: Explore the role of faith in spiritual growth (Telugu).
prompt: What gives you faith and hope in difficult times?

title: క్షేత్ర క్షేత్రజ్ఞ విభాగ యోగం - Kshetra Kshetrajna Vibhaga Yoga
objective: Understand the relationship between the body and the soul (Telugu).
prompt: How do you distinguish between your body and your true self?

title: గుణత్రయ విభాగ యోగం - Gunatraya Vibhaga Yoga
objective: Compare the paths of action, knowledge, and devotion (Telugu).
prompt: Which spiritual path resonates most with you: action, knowledge, or devotion?

title: పురుషోత్తమ యోగం - Purushottama Yoga
objective: Learn about the ultimate nature of the divine (Telugu).
prompt: How do you conceive of the highest truth or ultimate reality?

title: దైవాసుర సంపద్ విభాగ యోగం - Daivasura Sampad Vibhaga Yoga
objective: Understand the characteristics that lead to liberation or bondage (Telugu).
prompt: Which qualities do you want to cultivate more in your life?

title: శ్రద్ధాత్రయ విభాగ యోగం - Shraddhatraya Vibhaga Yoga
objective: Explore how faith manifests in different ways (Telugu).
prompt: How does your faith influence your daily choices and actions?

title: మోక్ష సన్యాస యోగం - Moksha Sanyasa Yoga
objective: Understand true renunciation and its spiritual significance (Telugu).
prompt: What attachments do you find most challenging to let go of?
